DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Crowd lines up along a line and protests.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>line</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Line</myLabel> <myToolTip>Line along which entities should protest</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtLinesFilter;required</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>leftOrRight</myVariableName> <myType>radio-combo</myType> <myLabel>Protest Along</myLabel> <myToolTip>Should the crowd protest to the left or right of the line</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>Left of line</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>Left of line;Right of line</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
